text: Francesca Annis (born 14 May 1945)Birthdays , Timesonline.co.uk, 14 May 2008; accessed 12 August 2014. is an English actress. She was born in Kensington, London, England. She is known for television roles in Reckless (1998), Wives and Daughters (1999), Deceit (2000) and Cranford (2007). She won the 1979 BATA Best Actress for the ITV serial Lillie. Her movie appearances include Krull (1983), Dune (1984), The Debt Collector (1999) and The Libertine (2004). From 1995 until 2006, she was in a domestic partnership with actor Ralph Fiennes. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London
title: Francesca Annis
